<style>
div.main-container {
    max-width: none;
}
body{
    padding-bottom: 0px;
}
.title{
    display: none;
}

.main-content{
    padding-top: 45px;
    height: 100%
}
</style>

<script>
var resize_iframe = function() {
    return function(){
        var textHeight = document.getElementById('limitations').clientHeight;
        var element = document.getElementById('vizFrame');
        element.style = 'height: calc(100vh - ' + (textHeight + 90) + 'px);'
    };
};
window.onload = resize_iframe();
window.onresize = resize_iframe();
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
  const iframeSrc = "https://epiforecasts.io/covid19-forecast-hub-europe-viz/";
  window.addEventListener("load", function(e) {
    const iframe = document.getElementById("vizFrame");
    if (iframe) {
      iframe.src = iframeSrc + window.location.search;
    }
  });
</script>
  
<script type="text/javascript">
  // read queryParams from iframe and rewrite current url
  var eventMethod = window.addEventListener
    ? "addEventListener"
    : "attachEvent";
  var eventer = window[eventMethod];
  var messageEvent = eventMethod === "attachEvent"
    ? "onmessage"
    : "message";

  eventer(messageEvent, function (e) {
    
    if (e.origin !== 'https://epiforecasts.io') {
      return;
    }
    
    if (e.data.$type === 'queryParams') {
      window.history.replaceState(null, null, '?' + e.data.value);
      console.log("PARENT SETTING", e.data.value);
    }
    
  });
</script>

<p id="limitations">
Please be aware of the [limitations](background.html) when interpreting the forecasts. We recommend to focus on the ensemble which would be expected to give the most reliable forecasts. Note that for horizons beyond one week, case forecasts have not always been reliable in the past, in particular in times of changing non-pharmaceutical interventions. The individual models that constitute the ensemble are shown for transparency but should not be taken on their own without fully acknowledging the limitations and engaging with the listed authors. These models have been contributed by independent teams who do not represent ECDC or the London School of Hygiene & Tropical Medicine.
</p>

<div class="row">
  <iframe width="100%"
    style="height: calc(100vh - 237px);"
    id="vizFrame"
    src="https://epiforecasts.io/covid19-forecast-hub-europe-viz/"
    frameborder="0"
    scrolling="no">
  </iframe>
</div>
